name: TCVR
description:
TCVR Gaming is an adult only gaming platform that connects teledildonics to the VR Game Engine, for life-like virtual gameplay, with a happy ending.

Game play is based around realistic adventures game quests like sky diving, jet-sking, first person shooter style gun range challeges, in-game puzzle challenges and MORE! All of our adventures are playable with one of our life-like Gamegirl Avatars for realistic, date-like scenarios that result in Adult Content Play.

Not only can you go on awesome dates & adventures with our Gamegirls, but, you can also have gamenight happy endings with them, via our connected teledildonics devices.

Don't want to play the game, but still want a good finish? Our Redroom awaits you for a custom order adult experience.

Videogames and Porn, together!

Who doesn't want a gamenight happy ending?!?
